short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the English translations of example sentences in Wanikani so you can try to guess them and then reveal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When learning vocabulary words in WaniKani, there are example sentences for use of the word, first in Japanese and then with an English translation. This extension covers up the English translation so you can try to translate the Japanese on your own, and once you're done guessing, you can click on the hidden English translation to reveal it.

There may be bugs I haven't discovered as I am only a humble average developer and I coded this in a short time and didn't do much testing, but it works for the purposes I wanted it for. If there are troublesome bugs discovered with no workarounds I may patch the extension in the future.

If you need to contact me you can email me at: jackwebster@outlook.com
Github repo for this extension: https://github.com/bwalaE/WaniKaniEnglishHider
